protocol.name: P-GSE21684-2
protocol.text: Plants were grown on 1X MSMO media supplemented with 3% sucrose

protocol.name: P-GSE21684-3
protocol.text: total RNA was extracted using Qiagen RNeasy Plant Mini kit and manufactuer's instructions

protocol.name: P-GSE21684-4
protocol.text: Biotinolyated cRNA was obtained using the protocol described by Schmid, M. et al. Nat. Genet. 37, 501-506 (2005)

protocol.name: P-GSE21684-5
protocol.text: Hybridization was performed according to the EukGE-WS2v4_450 protocol

protocol.name: P-GSE21684-6
protocol.text: Scanning was performed on a GCS3000 scanner

protocol.name: P-GSE21684-7
protocol.text: Data was normalized using the rma function of the affy package in R/Bioconductor
